comments:
Hi

I am coding in PHP normally, but when i type <script>, with the last >, eclipse freezes and i have to close it.
Sometimes i get this error
JVM terminated. Exit code=1
/usr/lib/jvm/java-gcj/bin/java
-Djava.library.path=/usr/lib/jni
-Dgnu.gcj.precompiled.db.path=/var/lib/gcj-4.1/classmap.db
-Dgnu.gcj.runtime.VMClassLoader.library_control=never
-Dosgi.locking=none
-jar /usr/lib/eclipse/startup.jar
-os linux
-ws gtk
-arch x86
-launcher /usr/lib/eclipse/eclipse
-name Eclipse
-showsplash 600
-exitdata 150800d
-install /usr/lib/eclipse
-vm /usr/lib/jvm/java-gcj/bin/java
-vmargs
-Djava.library.path=/usr/lib/jni
-Dgnu.gcj.precompiled.db.path=/var/lib/gcj-4.1/classmap.db
-Dgnu.gcj.runtime.VMClassLoader.library_control=never
-Dosgi.locking=none
-jar /usr/lib/eclipse/startup.jar 

After closing, when i restart eclipse, i get this error in php explorer:

   at org.eclipse.php.internal.ui.explorer.ExplorerPart.createPartControl(Unknown Source)

--> I can get ride of the error when i delete .project file, but typing <script> again causes the same error.

Thanks!
Pedro

Can yo attach the problematic file / project since this issue is not reproducable.

Also what version do you use, the file .projectOptions was replaced lately so we should investigate this your case.
since the loading of PHPProjectOptions was changed this senario is invalid.
